entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
